requirement_tested: Frontend application with dynamic data fetching from backend APIs
user_persona: A maritime industry professional looking for the latest news and events.
user_goal: To browse the latest news, company profiles, and upcoming events on the shipping blog.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Sarah navigates to the homepage and expects to see various sections populated with live data.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage URL in browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Homepage loads successfully showing dynamically fetched news snippets, company cards, event listings, and ad banners.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing News Articles
narrative_steps.description: Sarah sees several news cards and decides to read more about one that catches her interest.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a news card titled 'Global Shipping Rates Surge'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigates to the full article view displaying complete content fetched from /api/news endpoint.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Company Profiles
narrative_steps.description: Curious about featured companies, Sarah clicks on a company card to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a company card labeled 'Oceanic Logistics Inc.'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the detailed company profile page with information retrieved from /api/companies endpoint.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Upcoming Events
narrative_steps.description: Interested in networking opportunities, Sarah explores the events section.
narrative_steps.action: Click on an event card titled 'Annual Maritime Conference 2024'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Directed to the event details page showing date, location, and description pulled from /api/events endpoint.

requirement_tested: Backend API server connecting to PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A developer deploying the application for production use.
user_goal: Ensure backend services connect securely to the PostgreSQL database as configured.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Services
narrative_steps.description: Alex starts up the backend service after setting the correct environment variables.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` command ensuring DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, etc., are set.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Backend server initializes and establishes connection to PostgreSQL database without errors.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Data Retrieval
narrative_steps.description: Alex checks if the backend can retrieve sample records from each major table.
narrative_steps.action: Send GET requests to /api/news, /api/companies, and /api/events endpoints.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each request returns valid JSON responses containing data from corresponding PostgreSQL tables.

requirement_tested: News section displaying latest shipping industry news articles
user_persona: A regular reader interested in staying updated with shipping news.
user_goal: Read the most recent news articles published on the platform.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing News Section
narrative_steps.description: Jamie clicks the 'News' link in the navigation bar wanting to catch up on recent headlines.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'News' navigation link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the news listing page showing a chronological list of articles fetched from /api/news.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Full Article
narrative_steps.description: Jamie finds an interesting headline and clicks to read the entire piece.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the article titled 'New Regulations Impact Container Shipping'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Full article content is displayed including title, summary, body, publication date, and image.

requirement_tested: Company profiles section showcasing detailed company information
user_persona: A procurement manager searching for potential vendor partners.
user_goal: Discover and review detailed information about shipping companies.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Companies Section
narrative_steps.description: Patricia selects 'Companies' from the top menu to explore vendor options.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Companies' navigation link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Lands on the company directory page displaying a grid of company cards loaded from /api/companies.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Detailed Profile
narrative_steps.description: Patricia clicks on a company sheâ€™s considering for future contracts.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Marine Transport Solutions' company card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Displays the company's detailed profile including description, logo, and website link.

requirement_tested: Events section listing upcoming and past industry events
user_persona: An event coordinator planning attendance at industry gatherings.
user_goal: Find upcoming events and check details about past ones.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Events Page
narrative_steps.description: Raj visits the events section to find conferences happening this year.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Events' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the events calendar page showing sorted upcoming and past events from /api/events.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Event Details
narrative_steps.description: He notices an upcoming seminar and wants to know more before registering.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Digital Transformation in Shipping' event card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Event detail page appears with date, venue, description, and whether it's past or upcoming.

requirement_tested: Newsletter subscription functionality with email capture
user_persona: A visitor interested in receiving periodic updates from the blog.
user_goal: Subscribe to the newsletter to stay informed about new posts and events.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Email Address
narrative_steps.description: Morgan scrolls down to the bottom of the homepage and enters their email to subscribe.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'morgan@example.com' into the newsletter subscription input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Email address is accepted in the input field, enabling the Subscribe button.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Subscription Request
narrative_steps.description: Morgan clicks the Subscribe button hoping to get weekly updates.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Subscribe' button next to the email input.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Email is submitted via POST to /api/newsletter/subscribe, and a success message appears.

requirement_tested: Backend administration panel for managing ad spaces
user_persona: A marketing administrator responsible for placing ads on the site.
user_goal: Upload and manage advertising placements through the admin interface.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Into Admin Panel
narrative_steps.description: Taylor accesses the admin login page to begin managing ads.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to /admin and enter valid admin credentials.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Successfully logged in and redirected to the admin dashboard with multiple tabs available.

narrative_steps.title: Managing Ad Placements
narrative_steps.description: Taylor switches to the Ads tab to add a new promotional banner.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Ads' tab and then click 'Create New Ad Space'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Modal form opens with fields for title, image URL, target URL, and placement area.

narrative_steps.title: Saving New Advertisement
narrative_steps.description: After filling out the form, Taylor saves the new advertisement.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in the ad details and click 'Save'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New ad is created via POST to /api/admin/ads and now appears in the ad listings table.

requirement_tested: Responsive website layout with old lace background color
user_persona: A mobile user reading industry news during commute.
user_goal: Browse the website smoothly across different devices with consistent visual theme.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Site on Mobile Device
narrative_steps.description: Jordan opens the website on their smartphone while commuting.
narrative_steps.action: Open website URL on mobile browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Site renders responsively adjusting layout for smaller screen, maintaining #FDF5E6 background.

narrative_steps.title: Scrolling Through Content
narrative_steps.description: Jordan scrolls through various sections noticing uniformity in design.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll vertically through the homepage content.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All sections maintain proper spacing and alignment with old lace background consistently applied.

requirement_tested: UI components styled with rosy brown color scheme
user_persona: A UI reviewer checking brand consistency across the site.
user_goal: Verify that all interactive elements follow the designated color palette.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Component Styling
narrative_steps.description: Casey reviews the styling of key UI components like buttons and headers.
narrative_steps.action: Examine CSS styles or inspect element colors using DevTools.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Buttons, borders, and text elements utilize #BC8F8F (rosy brown) as defined in style guide.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Interactive States
narrative_steps.description: Casey verifies hover and focus states match the intended design.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over buttons and links, observe color changes.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Interactive states reflect appropriate transitions within the rosy brown theme.

requirement_tested: Database schema supporting news articles, company profiles, events, and advertisements
user_persona: A database administrator validating initial setup.
user_goal: Confirm that all required tables exist with correct schemas.

narrative_steps.title: Connecting to Database
narrative_steps.description: Dana connects directly to the PostgreSQL instance to verify table structures.
narrative_steps.action: Use psql or another tool to connect to myapp database.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Connection established using DB_USERNAME=myappuser and DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword.

narrative_steps.title: Listing Tables
narrative_steps.description: Dana queries for existing tables to ensure they were created properly.
narrative_steps.action: Execute '\dt' command or equivalent SQL query.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returns list of tables including news_articles, companies, events, advertisements, etc.

narrative_steps.title: Validating Table Schemas
narrative_steps.description: Dana inspects individual table schemas for correctness.
narrative_steps.action: Run '\d+ news_articles' and similar commands for other tables.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each table shows correct column names, types, constraints matching specification.

requirement_tested: User browsing capabilities for all content sections
user_persona: A casual visitor exploring the breadth of content offered.
user_goal: Effortlessly navigate between News, Companies, and Events sections.

narrative_steps.title: Using Navigation Bar
narrative_steps.description: Cameron uses the top navigation to switch between content categories.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'News', then 'Companies', then 'Events' links sequentially.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each click seamlessly transitions to respective section pages loading dynamic content.

narrative_steps.title: Returning to Homepage
narrative_steps.description: After exploring, Cameron wants to return to the main page.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the website logo or 'Home' link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected back to homepage where all major sections remain accessible.

requirement_tested: Administrative authentication system for backend management access
user_goal: Prevent unauthorized access to sensitive admin functionalities.

narrative_steps.title: Attempting Unauthorized Access
narrative_steps.description: Someone tries to reach the admin panel without logging in.
narrative_steps.action: Directly navigate to /admin/dashboard without authentication.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to /admin login page due to missing or invalid authorization token.

narrative_steps.title: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
narrative_steps.description: Admin logs in with proper username and password.
narrative_steps.action: Enter admin credentials and submit login form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Receives JWT token upon successful POST to /api/admin/login and gains access to dashboard.

requirement_tested: Content management system for creating and editing news articles
user_persona: Editorial staff publishing breaking news stories.
user_goal: Publish timely news articles through the CMS interface.

narrative_steps.title: Creating New Article
narrative_steps.description: Wesley logs into the admin panel to post a breaking story.
narrative_steps.action: Log into admin panel, go to News tab, click 'Create New Article'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Blank article creation form modal opens ready for input.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Published Article
narrative_steps.description: Wesley fills in article details and publishes immediately.
narrative_steps.action: Complete form fields and click 'Save'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Article is posted via POST to /api/admin/news and instantly visible on frontend news feed.

requirement_tested: Company profile creation and editing interface in admin panel
user_persona: Business development executive updating partner listings.
user_goal: Maintain accurate and current company directory listings.

narrative_steps.title: Adding New Company Entry
narrative_steps.description: Ashley adds a newly partnered logistics firm to the company directory.
narrative_steps.action: In admin panel, navigate to Companies tab and click 'Create New Company'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Empty company form modal appears prompting for name, description, logo, and website.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Existing Company Info
narrative_steps.description: Later, Ashley realizes a company's website has changed and needs updating.
narrative_steps.action: Locate the company in the table, click 'Edit', modify website field, click 'Save'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Changes are saved via PUT to /api/admin/companies/:id and reflected immediately on frontend.

requirement_tested: Event management system with date and location details
user_goal: Schedule and promote upcoming industry events accurately.

narrative_steps.title: Scheduling Future Event
narrative_steps.description: Tristan schedules a new maritime conference for later this year.
narrative_steps.action: Go to Events tab in admin panel, click 'Create New Event', fill in details.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New event form accepts title, date, location, and marks it as future event automatically.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Event Information
narrative_steps.description: Closer to the date, Tristan updates the event location based on venue change.
narrative_steps.action: Find the event in the list, click 'Edit', update location, save changes.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: PUT request updates event details via /api/admin/events/:id and reflects on public event page.
